name: Spirit Vessel
description: Forged by a god to entrap the soul of another.

abilities.name: Soul Release
abilities.description: When cast on an ally, consumes a charge to grant the target allied hero bonus health regeneration for a while. When cast on an enemy, consumes a charge to deal damage over time to the target, based on their current health, as well as reduce the effectiveness of healing and health restoration the target receives.
notes: Taking more than 0 damage from any other player (after reductions and not flagged as HP Removal) dispels the buff
Taking more than 0 damage from Roshan (after reductions) dispels the buff
Has no recharge time. Cooldown resetting effects do not restore charges
Gains charges whenever an enemy hero dies within range. Gains more charges when at 0 charges
Also gains charges when the wielder dies while at 0 charges
All current charges on Urn of Shadows are carried over when upgraded to a Spirit Vessel
Does not interrupt the wielder's channeling abilities
The caster does not require to face the target in order to cast it on them
Can only be cast on heroes, including illusions and creep-heroes
Gains charge for each enemy hero that dies within the radius
If the item is at 0 charges, it gains charges at once, otherwise, it gains charge
Does not gain charges from Illusions, Clones, or Creep-Heroes
Does not gain a charge if the enemy hero has Reincarnation
Has to be within the main inventory to gain charges
Successive casts on the same target do not stack but refresh the duration instead
Spirit Vessel's modifiers override the modifiers of Urn of Shadows
Can regenerate up to 320 health on target allies

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
If an Urn of Shadows was purchased as well, Spirit Vessel's icon takes priority
The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance
10 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
13.5 main attack damage to universal heroes
